abstract: If completed, a transaction would be one of the biggest health care deals of the year. And it could reap a sizable profit for Bausch & Lomb’s current owner, Warburg Pincus.
snippet: If completed, a transaction would be one of the biggest health care deals of the year. And it could reap a sizable profit for Bausch & Lomb’s current owner, Warburg Pincus.

headline.main: Takeover Is Expected For Eye-Care Company
headline.print_headline: Takeover Is Expected For Eye-Care Company

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
